sections.heading: of judgment; no cause for continuance or postponement
sections.text: The making of an offer pursuant to the provisions contained in section 25-901 shall not be a cause for a continuance of an action, or a postponement of a trial.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 566, p. 493;R.S.1913, ยง 7718;C.S.1922, ยง 8662;C.S.1929, ยง 20-90
